Parameter.name: APPLICATION
Parameter.Description: Class name of application this report belongs to.

Parameter.name: DEFAULTMODE
Parameter.Description: Specifies the default display mode used for this report if the URL parameter, <var>$MODE</var>, is not present.

Parameter.name: REPORTXMLNAMESPACE
Parameter.Description: This is the optional XML namespace used for the report.

XData.name: ReportDefinition
XData.Description: This XML defines the logical contents of this report.
XData.Data: <report xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/definition" name="Report" sql="SELECT AmountOfSale,DateOfSale,Outlet->City,Outlet->Country->Name as Country,Product->Name as Product,UnitsSold FROM HoleFoods.SalesTransaction WHERE Actual = 1 and Channel is not null and DateOfSale > TO_DATE('31-12-2012','DD-MM-YYYY') ORDER BY Product->Name, Country, DateOfSale"> <group name="ByProduct" breakOnField="Product"> <attribute name="Name" field="Product"/> <aggregate name="TotalAmount" type="SUM" field="AmountOfSale"/> <aggregate name="UnitsCount" type="SUM" field="UnitsSold"/> <group name="ByCountry" breakOnField="Country"> <attribute name="Country" field="Country"/> <aggregate name="CountryCount" type="COUNT" field="Country"/> <group name="Txn"> <attribute name="Amount" field="AmountOfSale"/> <attribute name="Date" field="DateOfSale"/> <attribute name="City" field="City"/> <attribute name="Units" field="UnitsSold"/> </group> </group> </group> </report>

XData.name: ReportDisplay
XData.Description: This XML defines the display for this report. This is used to generate the XSLT stylesheets for both HTML and XSL-FO.
